Body: I mistakenly installed 5.0 Lollipop on my NVIDIA SHIELD tablet, and I hate it. Is there a way to revert back to KitKat? I've tried finding a way, but no luck so far. This was the original post:How do I return to 4.4 KitKat from 5.0 Lollipop?StackExchange doesn't let me comment or reply to this question because I don't have enough reputation... so I am forced to create a duplicate.
Title: NVIDIA SHIELD tablet, how do I return to 4.4 KitKat from Lollipop?
